text: Neil F. Hartigan (born May 4, 1938) is an American Democrat. He was Illinois Attorney General, the 40th Lieutenant Governor, and a justice of the Illinois Appellate Court.Chicago reader: "What's the Deal With Neal Hartigan?" By Florence Hamlish Levinsohn October 25, 1990 Hartigan also was the Democratic nominee for Governor in 1990, but lost the race to Republican Jim Edgar. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from Chicago Category:Lieutenant Governors of Illinois Category:Politicians from Chicago Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Illinois attorneys general
title: Neil Hartigan
